item.content:
Adds visual 3D markers for current quest objectives.

A remake of Just Visual Objectives by yvileapsis in a FOSE plugin with no performance impact.

Requirements:

  • FOSE 1.3b2﻿
  • Command Extender

Configuration:

  • Edit F3VisualObjectives.ini file in Data/FOSE/Plugins.

Download

Update 1.5 04.11.21 - fixed issues with markers not disappearing when they should, i.e. when controls are disabled. Fixed vanilla bug with custom map markers which didn’t work in many parts of the map.

Source code

Credits:

  • yvileapsis ﻿for the original mod.
  • jazzisparis﻿, luthien ﻿and lStewieAl ﻿for their work reverse-engineering New Vegas, which was essential for porting this mod.
  • carxt ﻿for their implementation of WorldToScreen.
  • lStewieAl ﻿(again) for their work on Command Extender and always being very helpful in general.

item.title: No Muzzle Flash Lights
item.description: A simple mod that improves game performance in combat by disabling lights cast on the environment by muzzle flashes, which are very performance heavy in New Vegas and Fallout 3. The mod can be anywhere in your load order. New Vegas version does not take up a slot in the load order and comes with an .ini file in config/NMFL folder. By default, it only disables the lights for NPCs and leaves them on for the player.
item.content:
A simple mod that improves game performance in combat by disabling lights cast on the environment by muzzle flashes, which are very performance heavy in New Vegas and Fallout 3.

The mod can be anywhere in your load order.

New Vegas version does not take up a slot in the load order and comes with an .ini file in config/NMFL folder. By default, it only disables the lights for NPCs and leaves them on for the player.

Download links:

  • New Vegas (requires JohnnyGuitar NVSE 4.10+, JIP LN NVSE)
  • Fallout 3 (requires Command Extender)
